mapper.insert: insert into technology.application_admission (c_Id, c_name, c_category, c_legalPerson, c_date, c_fund, c_product, c_employee, c_information, file_name,c_status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cLegalperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cFund,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cEmployee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update technology.application_admission set c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_category = #{cCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_legalPerson = #{cLegalperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_date = #{cDate,jdbcType=DATE}, c_fund = #{cFund,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, c_product = #{cProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_employee = #{cEmployee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_information = #{cInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_status = #{cStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where c_Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select c_Id, c_name, c_category, c_legalPerson, c_date, c_fund, c_product, c_employee, c_information, file_name,c_status from technology.application_admission where c_Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
